div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1812 Susa, Susiana, 1947-8 Burial: after 90 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 67 AR. Pot hoard, from excava- tions Alexander III: 50 late post. tetradr. (Tem- nus) Antiochus III: 1 dr. (Ecbatana) Antiochus IV: 2 dr. (Ecbatana 1, An- tiocheia 1) Alexander I Bala: 12 dr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 2, Antiocheia 10) Demetrius II: 1 dr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Tiraeus I, Characene: 1 tetradr. (yr. 222 S.E. = 91/0 B.C.) Disposition: Paris 34; Teheran 33 â€ Le Rider, Suse, pp. 248 f., illus. Fischer, SM 1968, p. 11
